newsitem.title: CANADA: TSE says Bre-X trade delayed.
newsitem.headline: TSE says Bre-X trade delayed.

text.p: Resumption of trading of Bre-X Minerals Ltd was delayed on Tuesday due to technical difficulties and would not resume before 1300 EST/1800 GMT, the Toronto Stock Exchange said.
Trading in all stocks on the TSE stopped earlier in the session after the computer trading system collapsed, but trading excluding Bre-X resumed at about 1145 EST/1645 GMT.
The system was down for nearly an hour after collapsing minutes after trading in Bre-X resumed at 1030 EST/1530 GMT after a day-long halt.
A total of 7.78 million shares of the troubled Calgary exploration company changed hands in 22 minutes before the system crashed.
